name: Cubenaut
description:
Cubenaut is a game about space exploration in a procedurally generated universe. You explore a new universe every game, and can upgrade your satellite whenever. When you satellite runs out of resources, you can launch a new one.

Credits to Studio Frog for developing this game.

Members:

Producer: Jack Ducham

Lead Programmer: Aditya Bawankule

Programmers: Dana Sim, James Yang

Lead Artist: Gabe Rodriguez

Lead Sound Design: Ryan McDavitt

(Hold mouse2 to pan the map)
